name: raycast-trello-mm
title: Raycast Trello MM
description: This repository contains the code for a Raycast x Trello integration for Monkey Management. üêí
author: graffardi

commands.name: index
commands.title: To do - List cards
commands.description: List cards from the "To do" list.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
